title: A Coincidental Encounter
description: Some incidents stay in our hearts forever. They are the coincidental encounters where we meet a stranger who stays in our memories forever. Have you ever experienced one of those? Why do these unplanned events occur? Why do they have the power to shake our foundations, question our every decision?Meet Geetika as she experiences a strange rendezvous that changes her life forever.A short story, for all who believe in coincidences and are ready to take the plunge, a risk to conceive and create an unforgettable memory.
author: Payal Dedhia
